amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike sections 206 and 207 relating to N number restrictions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike sections 206 and 207, which place restrictions on the private sale of aircraft registration numbers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 329 (Roll no. 362).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 329 (Roll no. 362).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
